about_the_game:
In the autumn of 1944 supply lines from the Normandy beaches are stretched to the breaking point. A deep water port must be captured. Take command of the First Canadian Army once again and finish its journey through WW2.

First capture the channel ports of Boulogne and Calais. Then head into the flooded polder country of Belgium and the Netherlands in the bloody and bitter Scheldt river campaign. Construct bailey bridges to cross canals, fight across swamps, fight for every inch of damp ground and earn the nickname 'Water Rats'. Take part in Operation Veritable to push into Germany, and lastly provide relief to 4.5 million starving Dutch civilians.


Call in the Royal Canadian Air Force with the new versatile Air Support unit! Use aerial recon to inspect black & white photographs enemy positions, strafing runs with rocket-bearing Typhoon aircraft to deal with panzers and of course dropping lots, and lots of bombs.


Construct temporary bailey bridges with your engineers to cross canals and rivers. Choose your crossing points carefully, lest enemy artillery and strong counter attacks shatter your bridgehead.

Key Features

  • 7 new campaign missions (all playable in co-op!)
  • New Air Support unit with level-up veterancy perks (usable in non-DLC campaign missions too!)
  • Engineers can construct bridges
  • 90+ new historical photos and videos
detailed_description:
In the autumn of 1944 supply lines from the Normandy beaches are stretched to the breaking point. A deep water port must be captured. Take command of the First Canadian Army once again and finish its journey through WW2.

First capture the channel ports of Boulogne and Calais. Then head into the flooded polder country of Belgium and the Netherlands in the bloody and bitter Scheldt river campaign. Construct bailey bridges to cross canals, fight across swamps, fight for every inch of damp ground and earn the nickname 'Water Rats'. Take part in Operation Veritable to push into Germany, and lastly provide relief to 4.5 million starving Dutch civilians.


Call in the Royal Canadian Air Force with the new versatile Air Support unit! Use aerial recon to inspect black & white photographs enemy positions, strafing runs with rocket-bearing Typhoon aircraft to deal with panzers and of course dropping lots, and lots of bombs.


Construct temporary bailey bridges with your engineers to cross canals and rivers. Choose your crossing points carefully, lest enemy artillery and strong counter attacks shatter your bridgehead.

Key Features

  • 7 new campaign missions (all playable in co-op!)
  • New Air Support unit with level-up veterancy perks (usable in non-DLC campaign missions too!)
  • Engineers can construct bridges
  • 90+ new historical photos and videos

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Radio General - Water Rats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 64 bit, 3.2 Ghz i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) or Radeon R9 285 (2048 MB) - Integrated GPUs may work but are not supported.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take command of the First Canadian Army once again as you fight for the Channel ports and through the flooded polders of the Low Country. Construct bridges to cross canals and call in Air Support to perform aerial recon. Finish the Canadian army's journey through WW2.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
